Software Description: [iKitten](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0278) is a macOS exfiltration agent  (Citation: objsee mac malware 2017).
Mitigation Description: Use intrusion detection signatures to block traffic at network boundaries.
Application: Network intrusion prevention or data loss prevention tools may be set to block specific file types from leaving the network over unencrypted channels. An adversary may move to an encrypted channel or use other mechanisms of encapsulating the traffic in these situations.
Use: [iKitten](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0278) will zip up the /Library/Keychains directory before exfiltrating it.

Software Description: [iKitten](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0278) is a macOS exfiltration agent  (Citation: objsee mac malware 2017).
Mitigation Description: Set and enforce secure password policies for accounts.
Application: The password for the user's login keychain can be changed from the user's login password. This increases the complexity for an adversary because they need to know an additional password.
Use: [iKitten](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0278) collects the keychains on the system.
